admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide: (A) 10
            Primary Teacher Training Colleges: site development for, and
            the construction, furnishing and equipping of 7 of these;
            equipment only for the remaining three. (B) 32 existing
            General Secondary Schools: furniture and equipment for all
            32, and, in addition, building extensions at 21 of these.
            (C) National Curriculum Development Center: site
            development, construction, furniture and equipment. (D)
            Prince of Songkhla University: site development for, and the
            construction, furnishing and equipping of extensions to the
            Faculty of Science, and (E) Technical Assistance.
